post.body: going pretty well - only picked it up friday but swapped it out with another one yesterday since the y key was hanging off...
keeps checking out the window to see if it is still snowing
the theory of an extra hour in bed sounded good - in reality it was never going to happen
I'd like the new macbook - anyone interested in a black 3GB RAM 2.16GHz 160GB macbook? :)
01.com mail is down - mail boxes empty!
Why are there not more security conferences in the UK?
is resting - tooth has finally been removed...!
has just eaten... hmmm, what next?
is knackered - full day completed at Lego Land
is up later that he should be
is stuck in traffic - m4 screwed
is not looking forward to the extraction tommorow
is looking for more piccies to comment on
is suffering tooth ache - the kind where codine can bearly hold it off - dentist tommorow
is enjoying a perfect sunday - listening to www.helpmechill.com
really enjoyed saturday, and thanks his guests for coming over for the day
has found a dodgy 'y' key on his new eee pc :(
has his feet up and enjoying a very nice cold beer
scratch that - back to normal...heavy rain.
I'm shocked - where has this weather been hiding?
has been leveled by flu
still can't find his mobile, but has survived Christmas day
